title: Bootleg Farm's Table
desc:
Limited to 6-people each seating, Bootleg Farm's Dinner Table is a unique dining experience. Chef Diane DiMeo prepares a rustic style dinner, sometimes family style, sometimes plated, in a real house, on a real dining table, with an open kitchen. Its like traveling to a different country, sharing flavors, conversation and laughter on a table. 
 There is nothing like breaking bread with a great group of people in a casual setting. 
 Bootleg Farm's Table is the new way of dining, Its just you, the Chef and the Table: Chef To Table 
 This Chef's table will be part plated and part family style dinner:? 
 Roasted Bone Marrow, Polenta Cake, Fig Jam, Pickled Radish Fennel Salad, Quail Egg, Lardons, Roasted Tomatoes, Tarragon Vinaigrette Navarin of Lamb Cauliflower Puree Braised Fennel Gratin Triple Chocolate Custard
